cd /deploy/mai;python growth/growth/bin/bi_data_email/bi_data_email.py --sql_name=oppo_lh_real.sql --email_title=【脉脉-oppo】微创oppo信息流拉活数据 --emails=mengguangyang@taou.com,lipu@miage.com.cn --date_format=day_h ","schedule":{"cron_expression":"05 10-23/1 * * *"}},{"name":"sms-sms-monitoring","description":"次留短信量级监控","sv_name":"growth","start_command":"source /deploy/venv3/bin/activate; cd /deploy/mai; python growth/growth/bin/sms/ciliu_monitor.py","schedule":{"cron_expression":"30 19 * * *"}},{"name":"sms-algorithm-sms-delete-mongo-extra-uid","description":"短信-算法短信删除 mongo 多余 uid","sv_name":"growth","start_command":"source /deploy/venv3/bin/activate; cd /deploy/mai; python growth/growth/bin/sms/delete_mongo_algo_sms_until_limit.py","schedule":{"cron_expression":"30 9 * * *"}},{"name":"live-crowd-bag-tt_365ago_neco_phone","description":"拉活人群包-tt_365ago_neco_phone","sv_name":"growth","start_command":"source /deploy/venv3/bin/activate; cd /deploy/mai; python growth/growth/bin/custom_audience/main.py -c tt_365ago_neco_phone","schedule":{"cron_expression":"*/31 6-20 * * *"}},{"name":"live-crowd-bag-tt_365ago_neco","description":"拉活人群包-tt_365ago_neco","sv_name":"growth","start_command":"source /deploy/venv3/bin/activate; cd /deploy/mai; python growth/growth/bin/custom_audience/main.py -c tt_365ago_neco","schedule":{"cron_expression":"*/33 6-20 * * *"}}]}

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start
